lead_paragraph: The Indian power equipment maker Crompton Greaves has offered $400 million for the transformer division of United States-based Emerson Electric Company, India's Business Standard reported, citing three unnamed investment bankers familiar with the development.

headline.main: Crompton Said to Bid $400 Million for Emerson Unit

abstract: The Indian power equipment maker Crompton Greaves has offered $400 million for the transformer division of the United States-based Emerson Electric Company, India's Business Standard reported, citing three unnamed investment bankers familiar with the development.
